sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SYMPLOCOS, in botany : A genus of plants belonging to the claſs of polyadelphia, and to the order of polyandria ; and in the natural ſyſtem ranging under thoſe the order of which has not been determined. The calyx is quinquefid and inferior : the corolla is pentapetalous : the ſtamina are attached to the tube of the corolla in a fourfold ſeries. Only one ſpecies, the martinicenſis, is mentioned by Linnæus ; but l’Heritier of the Academy of Sciences at Paris had added four more, the ciponima, arechea, tinctoria, and alſtonia.
